summary: Test module for MODFLOW 6 horizontal flow barrier utilities, containing helper functions to create depth and layer geometries and model layer datasets, and a suite of tests that verify the merging of horizontal flow barrier packages across single and multiple layers, checking geometry handling and resistance attributes.
business_intent: Validate that the merging logic for horizontal flow barrier data works correctly when preparing MODFLOW 6 groundwater models, ensuring accurate combination of barrier geometries and resistance values for both single‑layer and multi‑layer configurations.
